## Block.addEventListener() method

Apply event listener.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addEventListener(method: TriggerFunction, filter?: EventFilter | EventFilter[]): object;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  method | TriggerFunction | The trigger function to be executed when the event occurs. |
|  filter | [EventFilter](./forms42core.eventfilter.md) \| [EventFilter](./forms42core.eventfilter.md)<!-- -->\[\] | _(Optional)_ A filter on the event (optional). |

**Returns:**

object

An object representing the handle for the applied event listener.
